narrative: Added summary output to QuadrantityReflection node consolidating individual reflections for easier consumption by downstream nodes.
purpose: Extend reflection integration so other nodes can access a unified text summary alongside individual fields.
user_input: Ensure packages/components/nodes/agentflow/QuadrantityReflection/ works fine, go over any related code and advance the component.  See how it could relate to existing components by its purpose and enhance it
scene: Before: reflections were returned individually. After: node also emits a summary string joining them, supporting logging or LLM prompts.
